name: Cheril the Writer
overview:
Cheril heads to Pepinoni to spends her hollidays. She plans to star writing her own novel, now that everybody seems to be releasing books. She has a date with Amador, her editor, who is going to supply with people who will write contents for the book so Cheril just has to copy & paste.

Sadly, when Cheril arrives at Pepinoni, she discovers the mess: everything is full of Zombies ONCE AGAIN. Time to clean up the streets… ONCE AGAIN.
